price: Nuko awusohokamo akebaguza, afite ubwoba (bw’uko ashobora gufatwa). Aravuga ati “Nyagasani! Nkiza abantu b’inkozi z’ibibi.”
arabic: فَخَرَجَ مِنۡهَا خَآئِفٗا يَتَرَقَّبُۖ قَالَ رَبِّ نَجِّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fakharaja min'hā khāifan yataraqqabu qāla rabbi najjinī mina al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
